none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 15, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
The first phase of NO CHOICE faded after the release of their killer Riot City EP, but the Welsh band reformed a couple of years later for another stint - one of a few different incarnations that would carry them well into the new century. A couple of new members on this 1985 demo, and a recording that honestly smokes the '83 vinyl slab.  QUESTION TIME

seo.title: No Choice (UK) - Question Time - Terminal Escape
